Uses of JodeList in xmlcomponents
 

Methods in xmlcomponents that return JodeList
 JodeList Jode.children()
          Gives you all of the children of this node
 JodeList Jode.children(JodeFilter filter)
          Will give you all of the children of this node that match the given filter
 JodeList Jode.children(java.lang.String nodeName)
          Will give you all of the children of this node that match the given name
 JodeList JodeList.distinct()
          Returns a new JodeList containing one node of each name
 JodeList JodeList.distinct(JodEqualityComparer comparer)
          Returns a new JodeList containing only distinct nodes as determined by the parameter passed into the method.
 JodeList JodeList.filter(JodeFilter filter)
          Will return a JodeList containing only nodes that matched the filter criteria
 JodeList JodeList.filter(java.lang.String nodeName)
          Will return a JodeList containing only nodes that match the given node name
 JodeList JodeList.search(JodeFilter filter)
          Recursively finds all nodes that match the given filter
 JodeList JodeList.search(java.lang.String nodeName)
          Recursively finds all nodes with the given name
 JodeList Jode.xPathFind(java.lang.String path)
          Uses an Xpath string to collect a set of nodes.
